item.title: Witnessing the death of the DVD
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: We dropped down to the 2-at-a-time plan on Netflix. They just can't get us any of the new movies anymore. We'll save $10/month which will allow us to get 2 new movies a month via download for "free".

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
They are going broke soon. I just got rid my membership and went to Blockbuster because I refuse to pay for Instant Watch that I can't use because of Silverlight. Vudu sounds interesting. Just stopped by to see what you were up to. I'm spending the next three months running the OH to Hershey for Heart Rehab. However the Other Half is doing well and the Doc said the heart disease hasn't progressed any in 6 years. Not bad for Ornish.
So Hi and I'm hooked on the Figure Skating myself.
